verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ أَرَءَيْتَ ٱلَّذِى يُكَذِّبُ بِٱلدِّينِ
verses.translation_en: Have you seen the one who denies the Recompense?
verses.translation_zh: 你曾见否认报应日的人吗？

verses.translation_en: For that is the one who drives away the orphan
And does not encourage the feeding of the poor.
verses.translation_zh: 且不勉励人赈济贫民的人。

verses.translation_en: So woe to those who pray
[But] who are heedless of their prayer -
Those who make show [of their deeds]

verses.translation_zh: 他们是不肯借人什物的。
